name: Warship (Unearthed Arcana)
speed: 4 miles per hour (96 miles per day)
conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, incapacitated, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, stunned, unconscious

trait.name: Control:
text: Move up to the speed of one of its movement components, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the Warship (Unearthed Arcana) can't turn.

trait.name: Movement:
text: Hit Points: 100; -10 ft. speed per 25 damage taken
Locomotion (water): sails, speed 35 ft.; 15 ft. while sailing into the wind; 50 ft. while sailing with the wind.

trait.name: Movement:
text: Hit Points: 100; -5 ft. speed per 25 damage taken
Locomotion (water): oars, speed 20 ft. with 80 or more rowers, 10 feet with 40 or more rowers, 5 ft. with 20 or more rowers.

action.name: Weapons:
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. 16 (3d10) piercing damage.

action.name: Weapons:
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 200/800 ft. (can't hit targets within 60 ft. of it), one target. 27 (5d10) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Weapons:
text: The Warship (Unearthed Arcana) has advantage on all saving throws relating to crashing when it crashes into a creature or object. Any damage it suffers from the crash is instead applied to the ram. These benefits do not apply if another vessel crashes into the Warship (Unearthed Arcana).

description: Source: Unearthed Arcana: Of Ships And Sea p. 5
